questions.question: What is the Meson project name defined in the root meson.build? (Provide the project name as a string)
What is the project version? (Provide the version string)
How many .c files are in the src/ directory (excluding generated files)? (Provide the count)
How many .cpp files are in the src/ directory? (Provide the count)
How many test files are in the tests/ directory? (Provide the count)
How many Meson wrap files are in the subprojects/ directory? (Provide the count)
What JSON library is used via Meson subproject? (Provide the library name)
What testing framework is used for C tests? (Provide the framework name)
What testing framework is used for C++ tests? (Provide the framework name)
What is the name of the protocol definition file used for code generation? (Provide the filename)
How many buildable components are in this repository? (Provide the count)
How many libraries (static or shared) are built in this project? (Provide the count)
Is libcore a static or shared library? (Answer 'static' or 'shared')
Is libdrivers a static or shared library? (Answer 'static' or 'shared')
What programming language is libcore.a written in? (Provide the language name)
What programming language is libdrivers.so written in? (Provide the language name)
What C files are generated by the protocol code generator? (Provide a list of filenames)
What is the name of the template file used by configure_file()? (Provide the filename)
What external packages does libcore.a depend on? (Provide a list)
What components does firmware.elf directly depend on? (Provide a list of component names)
What is the maximum dependency depth in this repository? (Provide a number)
In what order must the libraries be built? (Provide the build order as a list, starting with libraries that have no dependencies on other repository components)
Can libdrivers.so and libprotocol.a be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)
If libcore.a fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list)
What component does test_drivers depend on? (Provide the component name)
What Python script is used to generate protocol code? (Provide the relative path)
How many aggregators are defined in this build system? (Provide the count)
Does this repository have cross-language dependencies? (Answer yes or no)
How many unique external packages are used across all components? (Provide the count)
How many different programming languages are used in this repository? (Provide the count)

correlation.pattern: Agents with higher baseline show less improvement from RIG

time_reduction_vs_score_improvement.correlation_note: Greater time reduction correlates with better score improvement
